author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: So streamline
review:
Opening;

This flash speeder is very well built and sloped of in many places throughout the build .

The build-

The turret at the back uses a lightsaber hilt and a jumper connection , the seating area is sloped at the back and the engines are secured in the back , the nose features a sloped design and the sides are also sloped and tiled .

In conclusion-

this is such a streamline build with all the angles of the flash speeder captured perfectly and I recommend it to many different lego star wars demographics .
